pieces.name: Center Control
pieces.description: Gain +1 Square Value for occupying center squares.

pieces.name: Visionary
pieces.description: Gain +1 Square Value for attacking center squares.

pieces.name: X Marks the Spot (1)
pieces.description: Gain +1 Square Value on the long diagonal a1-h8.

pieces.name: X Marks the Spot (2)
pieces.description: Gain +1 Square Value on the long diagonal a8-h1.

pieces.name: Enemy Lines
pieces.description: Gain +2 Square Value on opponents back ranks (7, 8)

pieces.name: Railing (1)
pieces.description: Gain +1 Square Value for rank 4

pieces.name: Railing (2)
pieces.description: Gain +1 Square Value for rank 5

pieces.name: Ladders (1)
pieces.description: Gain +1 Square Value for file D

pieces.name: Ladders (2)
pieces.description: Gain +1 Square Value for file E

pieces.name: Foresight Knight
pieces.description: Movable Squares visible to a Knight gain +1

pieces.name: Foresight Rook
pieces.description: Movable Squares visible to a Rook gain +1

pieces.name: Foresight Squares
pieces.description: Movable Squares visible to a Bishop gain +1

pieces.name: Foresight Queen
pieces.description: Movable Squares visible to a Queen gain +1

pieces.name: Knights +1
pieces.description: Knight(s) gain +1 Piece value

pieces.name: Bishops +1
pieces.description: Bishop(s) gain +1 Piece value

pieces.name: Rooks +1
pieces.description: Rook(s) gain +1 Piece value

pieces.name: Queens +1
pieces.description: Queen(s) gain +1 Piece value

pieces.name: Pawns +1
pieces.description: Pawn(s) gain +1 Piece value

pieces.name: Pawn Storm
pieces.description: All Pawns gain +1 Piece Value for each Pawn in a chain.

pieces.name: Knight’s Gambit
pieces.description: Knights gain +1 Piece Value when placed on outpost squares.

pieces.name: Bishop’s Blessing
pieces.description: Bishops gain +1 Piece Value for each piece they attack diagonally.

pieces.name: Rook’s Rampage
pieces.description: Rooks gain +1 Piece Value for each open file they control.

pieces.name: Queen’s Gambit
pieces.description: The Queen gains +3 Piece Value when moved to a center square.

pieces.name: King’s Shield
pieces.description: The King grants +1 Piece Value to all adjacent pieces.

pieces.name: Battle Cry
pieces.description: The Knight grants +1 Square Value to all adjacent squares

pieces.name: Sacrificial
pieces.description: Captures improve +2 Square Value

pieces.name: Forked Lightning
pieces.description: Knights gain +1 Piece Value for each fork they create (attacking 2+ pieces).

pieces.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
pieces.description: Bishops gain +2 Piece Value when pinning an opponent’s piece.

pieces.name: Skewer Strike
pieces.description: Bishops gain +2 Piece Value when skewering an opponent’s pieces.

pieces.name: Promotion Power
pieces.description: Promoting a piece gains +3 Piece Value

pieces.name: Material Thief
pieces.description: Steal 1 Piece Value from your opponents knight(s).

pieces.name: Tempo Boost
pieces.description: Destination gains +1 Square Value for each square travelled.

pieces.name: Checkmate Threat
pieces.description: Gain +5 Square Value if your move puts the opponent in check.

pieces.name: Brilliant
pieces.description: If you deliver checkmate, double your final score for this turn.

pieces.name: Perpetual
pieces.description: Gain +2 Square Value for each consecutive check.

pieces.name: Surge
pieces.description: Gain +1 Piece Value for putting opponent in check.

pieces.name: Square Overload
pieces.description: Multiply Square Value by the number of pieces on the board.

pieces.name: Switch Material Advantage
pieces.description: Swap Player Material and Opponent Material values for this turn.

pieces.name: Infinite Loop
pieces.description: Repeat the scoring calculation for each pawn on the board

pieces.name: Zero Sum
pieces.description: Set Material Advantage to 0 and multiply Square Value by 10.

pieces.name: Paradox Engine
pieces.description: Score everything normally, then add negatives and score again
